column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I had the spicy tonkotsu ramen
column5: and the sukiyaki bowl. The ramen was pretty flavorful and the pork belly in the soup was very yummy. The pork bun was delicious
column6: as expected. The karaage was delicious but the gyoza was a bit too greasy for me. The moment I bit into the gyoza
column7: a splatter of oil cake out. My friend had the sukiyaki bowl and really enjoyed it.
